examples.korean: They decided to accept the government-mediated settlement. 발음듣기 그들은 정부 측이 제시한 중재안을 받아들이기로 결정했다 Neungyule
examples.english: They decided to accept the government-mediated settlement. 발음

examples.korean: During the procession, one of the fourteen meditations lamented a diabolical pride aimed at eliminating the family, an apparent reference to gay marriage and abortion. 발음듣기 미사가 진행되는 동안 14개의 중재안 중 하나로 안타깝게도 가정해체를 조장하는 극악무도한 것들인 게이결혼과 낙태를 언급했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: During the procession, one of the fourteen meditations lamented a diabolical pride aimed at eliminating the family, an apparent reference to gay marriage and abortion. 발음

examples.korean: His mediated settlement was acceptable to both labor and management. 발음듣기 그의 중재안은 노사 양쪽에게 받아들일 수 있는 것이었다. English Hidden Card
examples.english: His mediated settlement was acceptable to both labor and management. 발음

examples.korean: Her voice was heard all the way to the National Assembly, and the government proposed a mediation that included the rehiring of laid-off employees and living expenses provisions. 발음듣기 그녀의 목소리는 국회에까지 들렸으며, 정부는 해고된 종업원들을 다시 고용하고 생활비를 지급한다는 조항까지 포함된 중재안을 제시했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Her voice was heard all the way to the National Assembly, and the government proposed a mediation that included the rehiring of laid-off employees and living expenses provisions. 발음

examples.korean: The arrangements do not rival stakeholder pension schemes. 발음듣기 그 중재안은 지주연금 제도와 상반되지 않는다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. The Milky Way(2byp****) Hansard
examples.english: The arrangements do not rival stakeholder pension schemes. 발음
